text: Brian Field (15 December 1934 â€“ 27 April 1979) was a British clerk and criminal. He was one of the people who organised the Great Train Robbery of 1963.The Train Robbers by Piers Paul Read (1978) Fields died in a car crash in London. He was aged 44. His wife also died in the crash. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:1979 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in the United Kingdom Category:British criminals Category:Great Train Robbers Category:People from London
title: Brian Field
